Question: In February 2008, this person was awarded two Grammy Awards.
Hints: This person also appears in the music video, which was directed by Jonas & François.
On March 30, 2008, this person performed the song at Madonna's Hard Candy Promo Show at Roseland Ballroom in New York City.
The song "Give It to Me", a Timbaland single on which this person guests with Nelly Furtado, reached the Hot 100 number-one spot.
